content.title: Spectacles Scheme- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.beneficiary: Workers registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.details: The Spectacles Scheme aims to provide spectacles to workers registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board to improve their vision and overall well-being.
benefits: Provision of spectacles for eligible workers
Improved vision for better work performance
eligibility: Must be a registered worker under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
Must meet the criteria set by the scheme
content.application_process: Online application through the Labour Department Haryana website or Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
documents_required: Proof of registration as a worker
